attributes.action: reduce the number of cars on our roads
attributes.additional_details:
The roads in East Cambridgeshire like all roads in the UK, worn and over used by unnessasary car journeys. A national approach to this is to encourage the use of bicycles and Ely Cycling Campaign have designed a blue print for East Cambs which we want the Government to support and activley promote through out the UK by putting pressure on local government.
Please show your support and view our plan www.elycycle.org.uk .
